website_summaries.verdict: A excellent model that comes at a fraction of the price of others we reviewed. The best deal you will find.
pros: Sports four risers for the option of a high-step workout
Combines lightweight  construction with a sleek, space-saving design
cons: Not as sturdy as other models we tested

customer_reviews.title: Sent damaged goods
customer_reviews.text: So seems like it will work fine but the seller send me obviously used and returned items when it’s advertised as new. It has scuffs and marks all over the top. Clear and obviously wear and tear...It’s too much of a pain in the butt to return and it’s still functional but it’s unacceptably they would send me a used item.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: If they would spend the money to make the ribbed center part rubber instead of plastic, I would've given this product 5 stars. The plastic center is slippery even in running shoes. For example, when doing split squats with one foot behind you up on the step, that foot slips all over and could be potentially very dangerous. This could've been avoided by adding rubber instead of plastic. Pretty pricy for a plastic box. Other than that, I like the height and size.
customer_reviews.author: TXteachermom

customer_reviews.title: A great value
customer_reviews.text: We purchased THREE (3) units for a youth group - they work great. We also bought a mesh bag from Amazon that works great for transporting each unit:  Here is some additional information that might help other buyers: Maximum height of the step is 12". The base is 16" x 16". In addition, the "flat surface area" of the BLACK ribbed material is "12" x 9" The main blue/black step is 4" high. Each removable/stackable black section can only be used to adjust the height and each section will increase/decrease the height by 2" Note: Every section has 4 non-skid rubber feet to ensure a secure base on most any flooring.
customer_reviews.author: FastpitchPros

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I need them for - "The Firm" workouts
customer_reviews.text: I love this adjustable step! I needed a step that could be both high and low for some favorite workouts (The Firm), and this works perfectly. I had been thinking I would just make a box with differing heights, depending on how you position it, but figured out it would cost about 80% as much as ordering this, and would be VERY heavy and bulky, not easy to move and store like this is. The steps are very stable, strong, lightweight and perfect for what I need them for. I'm not a skinny little thing either, so they are definitely sturdy! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: ... this step with The Firm exercise and it works great
customer_reviews.text: I use this step with The Firm exercise and it works great
customer_reviews.author: Pamelynne.Richards

customer_reviews.title: Great for the exercises I need to do after months ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for the exercises I need to do after months of PT. Like the variable stackable height. Only issue is that stability best if foot is placed closer to inner area. Less stability if foot on the edge of platform but STILL OK.
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and Light weight too.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it is square and I can add levels to it. Since I am short, I sometimes need to raise my feet when sitting in a chair while playing a mountain dulcimer. This is lightweight and easy to carry around. I now use it as a step to get into my van for my very short grandmother. It is very stabile, even when used on the blacktop or slightly uneven surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia R.

customer_reviews.title: Great workout device
customer_reviews.text: The step workout device is just great. I am able to change the step height to different levels for a more (or less) intense workout. It works for me and keeps me in great shape and in best of health. It takes minimal amount of space, too. I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Evie09

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for knee replacement recovery
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for therapy recovering from a knee replacement and it has been perfect. We live in a small house but I could store the risers under the sofa until I worked up to each height. Very sturdy and stable. The surface is a bit small for both feet to fit comfortably in a full workout, though it can be done, so consider your needs before getting this size.
customer_reviews.author: G. Vandenbosche

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I'm really heavy so was worried if they would support allu weight and they do! Light weight, so easy to move room to room. Start low and progress to higher. Great and cute to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, nicely made and solid
customer_reviews.text: I like the stacking format of these steps. And you can put your weight anywhere, even the sides for calf stretches and it stays steady and I'm pretty hefty. Very happy with these exercise steps.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stepper is great and I can adjust the height as my leg ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently had knee replacement surgery, and I needed to do the same step exercises at home that I do in therapy to get my leg strong enough for work when I go back. This stepper is great and I can adjust the height as my leg gets stronger, and with prime, I got it in two days. Also, it's a great workout tool to burn calories so even when my leg gets strong again I can continue to use it to loose weight. I love it.​
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Stach

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for! Stable and easy to use and adjustable height. I don't have any issues with it tipping or feeling wobbly and I can easily get both feet on top without feeling unsteady. My feet are a size 8 and I am not a skinny workout video hottie...I am a stay at home mom with thyroid issues and it shows ;) It also works as a stool and seat when I'm not killing myself exercising with it! Dual purposes always get extra points in my book!
customer_reviews.author: SavedByGrace

customer_reviews.title: Great steps!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the steps! Easy to store, great quality, solid product. I'm so happy with my purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: VC

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: So great I use them all the time.. I even leave them stacked as a cube
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Heitmann

customer_reviews.title: Useful and Functional
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for knee therapy (practicing going up and down stairs--step up, step down) and for exercising. It works great. I haven't had a problem with it slipping or anything like that so far.
customer_reviews.author: reesah mouse

customer_reviews.title: Glad I saw all the reviews
customer_reviews.text: Glad I saw all the reviews, as everyone helped me on this one. I've wanted a stepper for a while, this one is great! It's very sturdy, perfect size, and the price is fair. I've been doing PT, and this really helps at home with recovery. Thanks for this product, I LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: High Step Working Stand
customer_reviews.text: After using this item a couple of times, it is making my legs stronger and at the same time improving my balance control on one(1) leg. If you want stronger legs this would definitely be a great investment in improving ones' health. I purchased this item in order to get back into jogging.
customer_reviews.author: TheBlackKnight007

customer_reviews.title: Quality Item
customer_reviews.text: I love that it has adjustable heights. It is very stable and I can even use it on carpet without worrying about it slipping or toppling. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Belleque

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to anyone looking for a non slip surface with ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a v well made heavy duty stepper. Would recommend to anyone looking for a non slip surface with a wide foot area. It feels safe and not as flimsy as some of the similar products on the market. This is what I would expect to find in a gym.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: so I can't speak to how sturdy it is
customer_reviews.text: I just received this today. Have not tried it out yet, so I can't speak to how sturdy it is. But, I too was disappointed at the condition of this step. It was supposed to be new - and I paid $62 for it. While, mine does not look like it was used, it definitely looks scuffed and discolored. If this is how they arrive from the manufacturer, then the price should be much cheaper. I will probably keep it, unless it proves to be dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: ceng208

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This is the best price I've seen for a step like this, and it fits in with my larger step....the risers are the same size. Quality seems fine too.
customer_reviews.author: seekerrm2233

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are just like what I use at the gym. I was so happy to find them and they were affordable. They work just exactly like they should. My foot doesn't slip off the top amd they don't slide around on the floor. 5 stars for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Best step and most compact, ever!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my Firm workouts. I bought a new home and did not want to pay for another stepper in my gym. There is nothing that compares to the effectiveness of this item. I finally just bought another one because my workouts did suffer.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love how compact it is. With weights you can get a great step work out on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy bench for multi uses pertaining to working out.
customer_reviews.text: Like sturdiness of this bench, color and height as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lady "C".

customer_reviews.title: You have to be kidding me...
customer_reviews.text: Item was clearly used, all 4 corners had scuffs and scratches. Came in purple (two different shades) instead of pink. Didn't feel sturdy at all. I'm giving it two stars because it resembled the picture posted.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Terpack

customer_reviews.title: They do the job they were made to do
customer_reviews.text: There's not really much to say. They do the job they were made to do. They stack nice and neat, and were affordable. What more could you want?
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dreher

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place and is solid!
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect for a workout! I put it on a thick foam exercise mat so I am not stepping onto concrete in my basement. Does not move when I use it. Made of solid quality material. Worth every penny! Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Used/Damage product sent.
customer_reviews.text: The product was obviously used - scratches and scuff marks around all 4 sides of the platform.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to any home gym
customer_reviews.text: I mean what else can you say it’s a atandRd mini stepper. I can use it for both feet and light enough to take to customer appts as a personal trainer
customer_reviews.author: Maricarmen Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I needed a step that was high enough to feel like I was doing something and this one is it. It's also small enough to fit in smaller area which is nice. I use this with a 12# weighted vest and it's wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty80Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: For almost $50 I expected anchor to the floor a bit better. However
customer_reviews.text: It arrived fast, and is exactly what I was looking for, perhaps a bit smaller than expected for the top part. Also, not as stable and as heavy as I thought it would be for the price. For almost $50 I expected anchor to the floor a bit better. However, I haven't had too much trouble and it makes sure I plant my feet properly.
customer_reviews.author: KMOSully

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I would like the boxes to be a little wider but this is good.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product 3 stars because it seen it be refurbished not new
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great compact stepper
customer_reviews.text: Everything I expected. Needed a stepper with increments. Recuperating from total knee replacement and learning to climb the stairs. This is an excellent learning tool. Would highly recommend. This is a compact stepper. Measures about a 16 inch square. If you are looking for a longer stepper, this is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: greeneyes

customer_reviews.title: Ordered new and received a used product.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the item new and this was used. I was shocked to receive this order to find the step up dirty and scratched.
customer_reviews.author: Nina P

customer_reviews.title: It is great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stepper! It is stable and well made. I like the different levels you can change out. It is nice size and weight.
customer_reviews.author: Islandgirl19

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product and Risers fit the original long Step
customer_reviews.text: Love this and the price is great. I have the original Step (the long bench) and these risers fit it perfectly if I want to add it that to make it a weight bench.
customer_reviews.author: Denise CS

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: Recovering from knee and back surgery I use similar steps at PT. I can't b in PT forever so I purchased these. They r sturdy, stay in place and most importantly I feel safe. Definately recommend
customer_reviews.author: D. Coble

customer_reviews.title: I love this! I use it all of the time
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I use it all of the time! It is the perfect size for a small home gym. It is really sturdy too!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Sadr

customer_reviews.title: just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: A great set for what you need it for. The 5 tiers allow for a variety of heights. I used it for re-habbing a knee. The non slip top is great and I like the compact size for easier storage
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Ehh.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't seem sturdy enough for a workout. Returned as soon as I got it. In their defense, I did get the cheapest one I could find, anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn J.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great workout step to take on the road
customer_reviews.text: This is a great workout step to take on the road. It is light, but durable, and adjusts to the height you feel like using on your workout day. A real asset to step workout tapes.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: These work great! They are sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These work great! They are sturdy, of great quality and compact. A good option if you are working out in a small space or storage is limited.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: ... it would be too short but it works just fine. The height is nice for knee step
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be too short but it works just fine. The height is nice for knee step ups
customer_reviews.author: toHKTYSL

customer_reviews.title: Step Love!
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived as advertised and I love the convenience of a small step for workouts. It's perfect when you don't have a lot of space to workout in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work beautifully! I have a compromised knee
customer_reviews.text: Work beautifully! I have a compromised knee,, so bench step ups and Bulgarian squats have been out of reach. These have allowed me to work out more confidently.
customer_reviews.author: Pam L.

customer_reviews.title: shop around for better value equipment
customer_reviews.text: Item is not for people who need or want a strong stable step. It's spongy and wobbles. May be ok for smaller framed people.
customer_reviews.author: Sgt. Devil Dawg

customer_reviews.title: Well design.
customer_reviews.text: This High Step is really well design. I recommand it for any one who is looking for a Higher intensity workout. Unfortunatly i couldn't use it due to a bad knee. I returned it no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Karine Calabra

customer_reviews.title: Very nice gym quality
customer_reviews.text: Description says 3 pieces but it's 4 spacers and one top piece for a total of 5. Heavy duty well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great work out
customer_reviews.text: easy to store and light weight. this has made exercise anywhere no matter what the weather, rain, sleet, or snow.
customer_reviews.author: Redsnest

customer_reviews.title: as expected
customer_reviews.text: well-made, compact, versatile set of exercise equipment. I can use it for a number of different things and easily store it when not is use.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product was okay but i was disappointed in that it lacked sturdiness.
customer_reviews.author: lk

customer_reviews.title: I like it but it would be better if they all ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it would be better if they all had the black in the middle instead of only one
customer_reviews.author: TERRI

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for step aerobics.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and great for my step aerobics at home. Highly recommend. I use it for Firm workouts. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper123

customer_reviews.title: Scuffed and Bad Smell
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed in how scuffed it is, it almost looks used but the rubber top isn't scuffed so it clearly wasn't. It also has a horrible smell in the box, hoping that will disappear once aired out.
customer_reviews.author: Marney

customer_reviews.title: Great Price When Compared to Similar Products
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple product that is hard to make a mistake on. But its price is what makes this such a great buy and thus worthy of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Miles T. Hanley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home workouts
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I need, it is functional and does not take up a lot of room. I really like how I can adjust the height as needed for my workouts!
customer_reviews.author: Mom021597

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to help with me replacement surgery
customer_reviews.author: bsw77

customer_reviews.title: perfect for home workout
customer_reviews.text: compact and stable - great for multipurpose exercise. Ease to store - and makes a great seat for kids when not in use!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Will work just fine! I'll be trying it out soon!
customer_reviews.author: jennie cage

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these steps! Great price for a great product. You definitely get your money's worth when you buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: dixiegoldilocks

customer_reviews.title: Good tool for therapy exercises.
customer_reviews.text: A sturdy and compact physical therapy tool. The individual sections also make the step easy to move.
customer_reviews.author: Old Homesteader

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great portable step. Easily fits in car for transport to clients
customer_reviews.author: jbc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for hip thrusts - it's just what I needed
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good for use for building skills for functional stair ascending and descending for home physical therapy.
customer_reviews.text: I am a physical therapist who works in patient's homes. This is a great product to work on building skills for stairs. It is 16x16 so it fits between the posts on a walker for training older patients who need the support of a walker. It adjusts from 4 inches then by 2 inch increments to build skills and strength for 6 inch and standard 8 inch rise steps. It goes to 10 and 12 inches which I would rarely need for this stairs training purpose. The unit may be used for step aerobics.
customer_reviews.author: fussybuyer

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the full step, but the full step doesn't support my weight. This one supports more weight but you loose much of the base that give you support when you step on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kile Kniffen

customer_reviews.title: Nice step.  Shipped fast. Not quite as sturdy as I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.text: I would buy this again, but it is a bit unstable. The risers are just a bit too small in my opinion. I noticed they are a bit smaller than the risers I have for my full size step. If I had to do it again I would have just purchased the top and left out the risers. I use the risers with my other step if I need extra height, I just put them on bottom and use my original risers on top. This seems to make it more stable.
customer_reviews.author: Readsforfun

customer_reviews.title: Steps are Stable
customer_reviews.text: The steps are stable and are easy to use. I use them every other day with dumbbells and free weights.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Carita

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for what I need. Nice and sturdy, too.
customer_reviews.author: the shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great step
customer_reviews.text: This step is great. Much easier to store than the longer version that you see at a gym. It's a great height, doesn't slide around, and my shoes grip to the top. Now if I could only get my butt out of bed to use it more often!
customer_reviews.author: lv2tumble13

customer_reviews.title: step box
customer_reviews.text: This was better than I expected. It is perfect for my work outs !! Well worth the money !!! I love it
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bachman

customer_reviews.title: USED
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and paid for a NEW stepper and the stepper I received was actually used. It was VERY scuffed and worn!! Disappointed in the color as well. The description says PINK and the picture looks pink but the product is purple and the sticker on the shipping box says purple. I would not pay $55.14 for a USED stepper.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: The scuff marks and spots of discoloration looks like someone got a few workouts on this before returning ...
customer_reviews.text: As seen on other reviews here, this was also a case of a well used item which I did not request but in fact requested a new item. The scuff marks and spots of discoloration looks like someone got a few workouts on this before returning it. This is appalling, how on earth does this happen so frequently with a single product, unless its a scam?!
customer_reviews.author: D. Rao

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Looks and acts as expected. Good quality. Small enough to store out of the way. A good short workout while watching tv .
customer_reviews.author: C. Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Color is off
customer_reviews.text: This is what I hoped for and what I expected it to be. The reason for the 3 stars is that the color pictured was inaccurate. I chose what I thought was a aqua stepper and the color is really hunter green. Had I known this I would have chosen a different color. On a positive note however, it does fit the extra risers I also bought off amazon.
customer_reviews.author: iloveamazon

customer_reviews.title: Revs up my workout
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Definitely doesn't move on carpet. I don't use any of the risers, however, so don't know if that would affect the step or not. Just using the top piece makes a difference in my workout.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K.

customer_reviews.title: Stable, flexible, compact
customer_reviews.text: It is compact yet sufficiently stable, with enough height using 3 or 4 steps, to do various step-up exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Strauss

customer_reviews.title: Received a used product.
customer_reviews.text: I believed I was ordering a new product for $52, but the product I've received is clearly used. It has several visible scuffs and scrapes. There was nothing in the product description at any point that led me to believe I was buying a used product.
customer_reviews.author: ST_Dallas

product_meta.title: Trademark Innovations High Step Work Out Training Device
product_meta.description: Add High Step to your workout to build lower body strength and get more muscles involved in routine exercises. Aerobic exercise will also improve lower body strength. High Steps can be used for a multitude of different exercises. Product takes almost zero space and can be stored away with great ease unlike so much other exercise equipment out there.
feature_bullets: Set of 4 risers that measure 16" by 16"
Risers stack to maximum height of 12"
Every riser has rubber non-slip gripping surface
Great for toning calves, thighs, glutes and more!
